title: Countries with the lowest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is appeared to be the highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
There is a difference of 27.59 between the maximum Country Eritrea and minimum Country Panama.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
Country Eritrea has the highest Inflation rate compared to previous year and Panama has the lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is appeared to be the highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate compared to previous year for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year 27.6 is found at Country Eritrea and the minimum is found at Panama where Country is 0.01.
Second maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year is found at Country Guinea-Bissau.
There is a difference of 27.59 between the maximum Country Eritrea and minimum Country Panama.
Inflation rate compared to previous year at Country Eritrea is 27.6 , second place is Guinea-Bissau at 2.58, and thirdly is United Arab Emirates at 1.5.
Country Switzerland, and Marshall Islands have a similar Inflation rate compared to previous year that is 0.57.
The Country Eritrea tends to be 13.99 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 39.47.
